description.value:
Moderate Curse The current of the waves constantly fights against you, putting you at risk of drowning any time you must Swim.

You lose any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Swim]{Swim} Speed you have, unless it's your only Speed, in which case you take a -20-foot status penalty to your swim Speed.

When you roll an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Swim]{Swim}, you always use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of your roll.
